selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer to match the expected output format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the selected multiple-choice option as the final answer.

new_skill_specs.name: identify_angle_in_diagram
new_skill_specs.purpose: Identify and verify the value of a specific angle in a geometric diagram.
edge_cases: Angle label not found in diagram
Multiple angles with the same label

new_skill_specs.name: map_value_to_mcq_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: Map a given value to the corresponding multiple-choice option.
edge_cases: Multiple options with the same value
